entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who says 'His badge' to Mrs. Weasley. He is described as saying this with an air of getting the worst over quickly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the prefect and his mother's youngest son. His mother is proud of him and thinks he could end up Head Boy.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as being preoccupied with pajamas but then reacts with excitement when she finds out Ron is a prefect.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's shriek is compared to Mrs. Weasley's, indicating that Hermione also reacted with excitement.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as being pushed aside by his mother and reacting indigantly when he says 'What are Fred and I, next-door neighbors?'

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as an example of someone who could be Head Boy.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is also mentioned as an example of someone who could be Head Boy.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley is proud of Ron and thinks he could end up Head Boy.
Fred and George are brothers, as mentioned in the line 'What are Fred and I, next-door neighbors?'
Ron is a member of the same family as Bill.
Ron is also a member of the same family as Percy.
